item.title: Getting help in R
item.description: Introduces how to read documentation for R functions and packages, and how to get help from the internet.

item.title: Intro to packages
item.description: Explains what an R package is, how to install and load them, and discusses a particularly important set of packages called the tidyverse.

item.description: Placeholder for Introduction to R via the Tidyverse lecture notes
